basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Curto Dikes Memorial Endowed Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are majoring in Kinesiology Â– Outdoor and Community Recreation. Eligibility Requirements Must be an Outdoor and Community Recreation major at UCO. In a short essay, applicants must demonstrate a financial need for this scholarship. In the same essay, please demonstrate your passion and involvement with the Outdoor and Community Recreation program and/ or community. Please provide examples. Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship
